attributes.action: Stop further Tax increases on Alcohol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No further Tax increase on Alcohol, The only person who will benefit is the Chancellor. The increase will have no effect on peoples drinking habits. Look into the reasons why people are drinking. In my case I need a couple of glasses of wine when I arrive home from work because I am so stressed out from my drive home on our overcrowded British  roads. Cars are here to stay. Build more roads. I like many others are using roads that were designed for horse and carts to try and escape the traffic, it’s shocking.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
